mapper.select: SELECT A.PNO PNO ,A.PNAME PNAME ,A.PTYPE PTYPE ,A.PGENDER PGENDER ,A.PNEUTRAL PNEUTRAL ,A.PPHOTO PPHOTO ,A.PWEIGHT PWEIGHT ,A.PHOSPITAL PHOSPITAL ,A.PMEMO PMEMO ,A.PAGES PAGES ,A.MNO MNO ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,A.INSERTDATE INSERTDATE ,A.UPDATEDATE UPDATEDATE FROM PET A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.MNO='M202111140003' ORDER BY -2
